section.title: tcp.established
section.para: incremented each time a tcp connection is established.

section.title: tcp.passive_open
section.para: total number of accepted connections (so far).

section.title: tcp.connect_success
section.para: total number of successfully active opened connections (successful connect()s).

section.title: tcp.connect_failed
section.para: number of failed active connection attempts.

section.title: tcp.con_timeout
section.para: total number of connections that did timeout (idle for too long).

section.title: tcp.con_reset
section.para: total number of TCP_RSTs received on established connections.

section.title: tcp.send_timeout
section.para: number of send attempts that failed due to a timeout(note: works only in tcp async mode).

section.title: tcp.sendq_full
section.para: number of send attempts that failed because of exceeded bufferingcapacity (send queue full, works only in tcp async mode).

section.title: tcp.current_write_queue_size
section.para: current sum of all the connections write queue sizes.
